dt-option.name: rowGroup.enable
dt-option.summary: Provides the ability to disable row grouping at initialisation

type.description: As a boolean value this property will control whether RowGroup is enabled or disabled for a DataTable.

dt-option.default: RowGroup will be initialised if the `-init rowGroup` property is specified in the table initialisation.
dt-option.description: When using RowGroup you are most likely to set up an initial grouping configuration for the end user (using the `-init rowGroup.dataSrc`) option. But if you wish to provide the option to have the table initially un-grouped and let the user select the group (`-api rowGroup().dataSrc()`) this option provides that ability.
